schemas.description: VISTA Hemisphere Survey (VHS) band-merged multi-waveband catalogues Data Release 5

tables.description: This multi-band source catalogue provides aperture photometry in four near infrared broad-band filters: Y, J, H and Ks for almost 1.4 billion detections. The total coverage of the VHS survey is almost 17000 square degrees in the South Hemisphere.

columns.description: Source name in IAU convention
